body.name: ViewSonic Omni VX2728J-2K 27 Inch Gaming Monitor 1440p 180hz 0.5ms IPS w/FreeSync Premium, Advanced Ergonomics, HDMI, and DisplayPort, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 18 mins
features: SEE THE DIFFERENCE: 27 Inch QHD (2560x1440p) IPS gaming monitor with thin bezels
MAXIMIZED GAMEPLAY: 180Hz refresh rate and 0.5ms (MPRT) response time for ultimate gaming experience
ULTRA-SMOOTH GAMING: AMD FreeSync Premium technology enables fluid and tear-free gameplay
ERGONOMIC STAND: Advanced ergonomics (tilt, swivel, rotate and height) for all-day comfort
HDR10 CONTENT SUPPORT: For deep contrast, rich color, and vibrant details
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: The VX2728J-2K supports laptops, PCs, Macs and more with HDMI, and DisplayPort inputs
body.description: The ViewSonic OMNI™ VX2728J-2K is a 27” QHD IPS gaming monitor built for gaming and entertainment. Featuring a 180Hz refresh rate and AMD FreeSync Premium technology, this monitor virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering for fluid game play during fast-paced action scenes. An ultra-fast 0.5ms (MPRT) response time also provides smooth screen performance free from blurring or ghosting. A fully adjustable ergonomic stand and a three-sided borderless design maximizes viewing size and an optimized set-up while minimizing frame distractions. Flexible connectivity options such as DisplayPort and HDMI allow you to connect to your dedicated graphics card and gaming console. The VX2728J-2K features all the perks needed to dominate your gaming and entertainment quests.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VX2728J-2K 27" OMNI 1440p 180Hz 1ms IPS Ergonomic Gaming Monitor with AMD FreeSync Premium Featuring a 180Hz refresh rate and AMD FreeSync Premium technology, this monitor virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering for fluid game play during fast-paced action scenes. An ultra-fast 0.5ms (MPRT) response time also provides smooth screen performance free from blurring or ghosting. A fully adjustable ergonomic stand and a three-sided borderless design maximizes viewing size and an optimized set-up while minimizing frame distractions. Flexible connectivity options such as DisplayPort and HDMI allow you to connect to your dedicated graphics card and gaming console. The VX2728J-2K features all the perks needed to dominate your gaming and entertainment quests. Features Premium Gaming Features AMD FreeSync Premium Ergonomically Designed For Gamers Quad HD Resolution Flexible Connectivity

Features Premium Gaming Features No compromises and great performance for everyday gaming includes a nimble IPS panel with 180Hz refresh rate for ultra-smooth gameplay. In addition, a 0.5ms (MPRT) response time allows you to react quickly and game with precision. AMD FreeSync Premium This monitor is equipped with VESA FreeSync Premium which seamlessly synchronizes the frame rate output between your graphics card and monitor. This dynamic refresh rate effectively eliminates image tearing, stuttering, and jerkiness for smooth gameplay. Ergonomically Designed For Gamers This monitor features a fully adjustable ergonomic stand capable of considerable swivel, pivot, tilt, and height adjustment. The stand is also designed with a cable management feature that helps reduce clutter around your gaming space.

Quad HD Resolution At four times the resolution of a traditional 720p panel, and almost double that of a traditional 1080p display, QHD results in a much sharper image, with no distortion or stretching, all while maintaining the same 16:9 aspect ratio. QHD resolution also provides up to 77% more screen space for a more immersive experience. Flexible Connectivity Quick and flexible connectivity options include 2x HDMI 2.0, 1x DisplayPort 1.2 and audio out. Wall mountable VESA 100x100mm compatibility adds additional convenience and versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good monitor for the price I like the adjustability and the tilt and the tall stand looks better then my old LG 2k monitor I was not sure about the brand but they seem to make decent gaming monitors for a good price high refresh rate as well and free sync if u got an AMD card .works good on the Xbox series X does 2k at 120FPs all in all solid display for the price .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 5 stars for me. 27in 1440p is the sweet spot for mid-high end rigs. I adjust colors with nvidia, so I’m not sure how the stock colors are. Monitor came in perfect condition with 0 flaws. Best price I’ve seen for the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good monitor, incorrect info provided on listing
reviews.reviewText: The monitor you get will have Viewsonic branding on it, not OMNI as shown in the picture. Additionally it is not capable (to my knowledge) of running at 180hz, and caps at 165hz. Everything else should be as described in the listing.Still a great monitor for the money and I only had to return once for some dead pixels, replacement was fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiene excelente imagen, para jugar, programar y ver videos. Además, trae sonido propio.
reviews.reviewText: Tiene excelente imagen, para jugar, programar y ver videos. Además, trae sonido propio. De las mejores compras en monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very basic monitor
reviews.reviewText: Nothing special about this monitor, I hope so it's a good quality hardware. Picture quality low end a lot of color bleed 😔. But on the other hand how much you pay for it it's a decent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Soecs Great 27” Monitor
reviews.reviewText: Had to replace my ASUS 27” monitor. This Viewsonic Omni VX2728J had better specs and cost less. So far I do like it. I bumped up the refresh rate. I also took off power saving and went through each screen option on monitor till I had the best screen. I have two monitors and the other one is an ASSUS and the Viewsonic looks better and is my main monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It seems to be good so far. My only raised eye is when I received this and unboxed it I came to notice that the monitor doesn’t same OMNI on the front like in the picture or various unboxing videos you can look up. The box states it’s the exact specs and when I boot it up it says View sonic gaming. So i’m not exactly sure. I think it is the right monitor but I don’t know maybe a manufacturer error. Seems to be 4k. Do what you will with that info. Decent monitor though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Esperaba algo mejor por el precio que se pagó
reviews.reviewText: La pantalla es grande, vino muy bien empacada, pero no es gran cosa. Primero los colores no son la gran cosa, a parte si se le activa el HDR pierde color. Segundo al restaurarla de fabrica, quedan todos los colores palidos y toca ir por alla a una opción que toca encenderla para que los colores cobren vida y solo se puede aplicar al puerto DisplayPort, no a los HDMI, es decir al restaurar a fabrica si conecto el portatil al HDMI y le activo el HDR la imagen queda como si la hubieran lavado, palida palida. Tercero y ultimo, el otro día jugando, mientras el juego cargaba, la pantalla estaba negra y con la luz de la habitación apagada observé que tiene fugas de luz en ambos costados de cada esquina. La verdad la compré porque se supone que la marca es buena y desistí de pantallas LG y ASUS por el mismo problema del punto 3 y al ver que nadie decia que esta pantalla tenía ese problema decidí comprarla y me salio con el mismo problema.

Me encantó, no van a encontrar nada por el mismo precio, yo lo encontré en oferta y lo agarre por $4800 pesos mexicanos aproximadamente $240 USD, me encantó que tenga una pequeña bocina la cual no destaca pero es de gran ayuda (en mi caso no tenia audífonos ni bocinas externa a la mano cuando me tocó probarlo) y la bocina auw incluia me quito de un apuro, es pafa gamer yo lo ocupo para jugar apex lengends y fortnite a 144hz este monitor de base anda en 165hz pero se puede hacer overlock a 180hz y la calidad es muy buena 2k, es mas que aceptable y los colores del panel ips son muy buenos, nítido. Lo tengo desde diciembre y hasta el momento (febrero de 2024) no tengo detalle algunos por ahí había leído que había gente que tenía bleeding pero hasta el momento yo no he experimentado nada de eso, estoy mas que satisfecho porbwue estuve busque y busque un monitor con estas características específicas y no encontraba fue el único que encontré y además está respaldada por la marca Viewsonic que fue una de las primeras y mejores marcas de monitores por ahí de 1980-1990 y otra cosa me encanto fue que puedes girar y levantar o acortar el monitor a tu gusto e incluso puedes poner en vertical el monitor sin necesidad de usar un soporte externo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good 27" 1080p 165hz IPS monitor, highly adjustable stand
reviews.reviewText: First off, know that you're getting a 1080p 27" monitor so pixel density will not be as good as 27" 1440p or 24" 1080p. This is not the monitor for you if you are sensitive to pixel density, or if you sit quite close to the monitor. I sit quite far and I'm not as young as I'd like to be, so 1080p 27" is good for me without needing to mess with DPI settings.No dead pixels upon testing, so that's always a good sign of quality control. I was able to enable G-Sync and run at 1080p at 165hz. I don't have a colorimeter but colors look good to me setting to sRGB mode, though I had to turn the brightness down a bit.HDR could be enabled and I tested it with Youtube briefly, but I kept it off because it was too bright for day-to-day use. Regardless, I don't expect crazy HDR effects at this price range with peak brightness being 250 cd/m² per Viewsonic. It's IPS so it won't have OLED level blacks. Viewing angles are quite good.I love the stand as it is height, tilt, swivel, *and* pivot adjustable, and quite stable!One last note is that for some reason Nvidia's control panel allows me to set the color depth to 10-bit, even though Viewsonic says this is an 8-bit (6 bit + FRC) monitor. Not sure why that is.Overall, I'm quite happy with the purchase especially at the initial introductory price.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is not a qhd monitor as displayed in technical details, its a 1080p monitor
reviews.reviewText: This is not a qhd monitor as displayed in technical details, its a 1080p monitor. The details were not properly specified.
love this monitor, it's sleek, has excellent video quality, and has better pricing as compared to other monitors like MSA< ASUS, LG, and Samsung.

reviews.reviewTitle: I really wanted to like this monitor.
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this monitor, however, it lacks some features and the image quality is not that amazing. My unit came with noticeable backlight bleed, and considering I am always gaming without the lights on, this is noticeable.
